personal_guide: Your personal guide to a healthy lifestyle.
personalized_recommendations: Discover personalized recommendations for your ideal diet
dont_have_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up
already_have_account: Already have an account? Log In
exercise_frequency: How many times a week do you plan to exercise?
sedentary_description: Mostly sitting or lying down, minimal physical activity (e.g., desk job)
lightly_active_description: Light physical activity, standing or walking for part of the day (e.g., teacher, salesperson)
moderately_active_description: Regular physical activity, standing or walking most of the day (e.g., nurse, server)
very_active_description: Physically demanding job with significant movement (e.g., construction worker, delivery person)
extremely_active_description: Highly physical job with heavy lifting or intense physical labor (e.g., professional athlete, farmer)
height_weight_info: These metrics help us calculate your BMI and tailor your plan based on your current body composition.
age_info: Age is crucial for determining your basal metabolic rate (BMR), which affects your daily calorie needs.
gender_info: Gender impacts metabolic rate and fat distribution, which is essential for accurate fitness and nutrition recommendations.
validation_short_password: Password must be at least 6 characters long
try_again_later: Please try again in a few minutes.
incorrect_email_password: Incorrect email or password. You can try again or sign up.
onboarding_pre_onboarding_heading: To create a personalized fitness plan, we need some information from you.
onboarding_third_heading: Are you a beginner or experienced?
beginner_description: I'm just starting with exercise or have limited experience. I want to learn the basics and build healthy habits.
experienced_description: I have been working out regularly for several months or years. I have clear goals and seek effective ways to achieve them.
error_saving_profile: Error saving profile. Please try again.
